one_reviews_text:
This is the first and only game I will ever purchase on this store, since I was given a $20 credit after waiting 4 months for Oculus to replace my left controller.

The game itself is awesome, basically FTL in VR. Facebook can burn in a trashfire.

review_title: The main menu does not work, unplayable
one_reviews_text: Started the game using AirLink and was unable to operate the main menu.  I may try it cabled up to see what happens.
